attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When a Prime Minister retires, there should automatically be a General Election.  When Labour were elected Tony Blair was in charge.  I believe that the Electorate chose them mainly because he was in charge with his selected cabinet. 
 Now we have a totally different leader and a totally different cabinet. They were not what people used their crosses for. 
If the electorate want the new regime, then I am sure they will vote for them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
